gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hawks 126, Pistons 120
gameRecap.excerpt: Dejounte Murray led the Hawks with 32 points and a season-high 10 assists as they defeated the Pistons, 126-120. Saddiq Bey added 19 points and 5 rebounds while Bogdan Bogdaovic totaled a season-high 17 points for Atlanta. Ausar Thompson tallied 21 points, 8 rebounds, 5 assists, 3 steals, and 2 blocks for Detroit in the loss. The Hawks improve to 6-4 as the Pistons move to 2-10 on the regular season. The Hawks are now 1-0 while the Pistons are 0-2 in East: Group A play.
